author: aconway
msg: Build support for clustering, initial CPG wrapper & tests.
- src/qpid/cluster/Cpg.cpp: C++ wrapper for the openais CPG library.
- src/tests/unit/Cpg.cpp: verify CPG functions in make check.
- makefiles etc.: build cluster stuff only if openais is installed.

author: bravi
msg: Fixing the bindings module continuum failure because of cxf code changes.

author: ate
msg: Fix for JS2-484: UserDetailsPortlet doesn't "see" newly added roles until after logging out and in again
I've added messaging to the RoleDetails and GroupDetails portlets to notify the UserDetailsPortlet to refresh its Roles (or Groups) cache.
Note: for these messages to be picked up, I had to disable the content cache for the UserDetailsPortlet.
We need a way to clear portlet content caches for selected portlets which are not on the current page...

author: apetrelli
msg: Updated Struts2-Tiles plugin to depend on Tiles 2.0.4.
